Upcoming West Coast Optimization Meeting

Dmitriy Drusvyatskiy. Feb 27, 2018.
1 minute read

West Coast Optimization Meeting, WCOM takes place annually, with the Fall meeting hosted by a partner University in Canada and the Spring meeting hosted at University of Washington in Seattle. This yearâ€™s WCOM at UW will take place on May 5th. For up-to-date information, please see the WCOM webpage, and please stop by if you are in the area!
